I A C U C/ D L A M
136 HARRISON AVENUE
BOSTON, MA 02111

citations.narrative:
The following general housekeeping issues were noted during the inspection of room 378B. The room houses tree shrews
and their behavioral testing equipment. The two-shelved table in the room and the area of the room near the table was
cluttered in appearance from the large number of assorted items and experimental equipment present. There was also a
spray bottle containing disinfectant solution on the top shelf close to covered bins containing food for the shrews as well
as a transport enclosure on the floor of the room.
Per this Section, premises shall be kept clean to facilitate prescribed husbandry practices and to protect the health of the
animals. The presence of the large number of items impairs effective cleaning of the housing room and disinfectants
should not be kept close to food supplies. The room needs to be cleaned and the clutter reduced, and the level of
housekeeping of the area improved. Correct by 8/28/25.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.
*END OF REPORT*
n

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
The following general housekeeping issues were noted during the inspection of room 378B. The room houses tree shrews 
and their behavioral testing equipment. The two-shelved table in the room and the area of the room near the table was 
cluttered in appearance from the large number of assorted items and experimental equipment present. There was also a 
spray bottle containing disinfectant solution on the top shelf close to covered bins containing food for the shrews as well 
as a transport enclosure on the floor of the room.  
 
Per this Section, premises shall be kept clean to facilitate prescribed husbandry practices and to protect the health of the 
animals. The presence of the large number of items impairs effective cleaning of the housing room and disinfectants 
should not be kept close to food supplies. The room needs to be cleaned and the clutter reduced, and the level of 
housekeeping of the area improved. Correct by 8/28/25. 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.  
 
*END OF REPORT* 
 
 n
